reason: Equation reference error: Node 1.3 states 'composition relations (eqs 2.19-2.20)' but the lasso composition relations (L_{1<-tau} x L_{tau<-1} = (1+xi^2)/xi^{3/2} P_1^{(2)} and L_{tau<-1} x L_{1<-tau} = (1+xi^2)/xi^{3/2} P_tau^{(1)}) correspond to equations (2.29)-(2.30) in the compiled paper, not (2.19)-(2.20). Eqs (2.19)-(2.20) are actually the definition of twisted sector operators (id_tau, T_tau, L_tau^{tau tau}) and the Dehn twist (T_tau = e^{2 pi i P_tau}). Verified by counting all numbered equation/align environments from Section 2 start (TeX line 66) using jheppub.sty numberwithin{equation}{section}, accounting for all \nn (nonumber) tags. The TeX labels Lasso1tau and Lassotau1 are at lines 284 and 286.
